name: Octos Creative Communication
description:
Octos was created in 2003 from the amalgamation of talent from an American with over 20 years programming experience and a Brazilian immigrant with 15+ years of experience in graphic design. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, technological and financial heart of the United States, which in gives the advantage of offering the best for web technology and concepts development of websites. Our job is to create websites that function as a real tool sales.
We like to work with our customers directly, explaining all the elements involved in creating a site, a complicated process full of acronyms that make no sense to someone not familiar with technical terms. We are agile, with technical expertise, committed to deadlines and targets and concerned full consideration to its customers. Our motto is "your business is our business" Therefore always provide your company the best solution and best service in web interfaces, creating sites, optimizing for Google and hosting.
